stem: Numbness isolated to the first interdigital web space between the hallux and second toe localizes to which nerve?
rationale_correct: The deep fibular nerve provides cutaneous sensation to the first web space.

rationale_distractors.C: Superficial fibular supplies most dorsum except the first web space.
rationale_distractors.D: Sural supplies posterolateral leg and lateral foot.
rationale_distractors.E: Tibial supplies plantar surface via medial/lateral plantar nerves.
